resources.string: This App is a Telegram plugin for the EgiGeoZone app, which sends command messages to a bot. The bot is defined on the server side of Fhem, but it could be used also for other bots.

THIS SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED BY THE COPYRIGHT HOLDERS AND CONTRIBUTORS \"AS IS\" AND ANY EXPRESS OR IMPLIED WARRANTIES, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE ARE DISCLAIMED. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE COPYRIGHT OWNER OR CONTRIBUTORS BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, EXEMPLARY, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES (INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, PROCUREMENT OF SUBSTITUTE GOODS OR SERVICES; LOSS OF USE, DATA, OR PROFITS; OR BUSINESS INTERRUPTION) HOWEVER CAUSED AND ON ANY THEORY OF LIABILITY, WHETHER IN CONTRACT, STRICT LIABILITY, OR TORT (INCLUDING NEGLIGENCE OR OTHERWISE) ARISING IN ANY WAY OUT OF THE USE OF THIS SOFTWARE, EVEN IF ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGE.\n\nA few of the icons are made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com
Enter your bot username (from FHEM or other)
Send fake test message (from first entry)
Enter your phone number and wait for confirmation code
The bot user name was not recognized. Please log off and log in again with the correct bot username.
Do not show notification (reponse from Bot)

From Android 6 you have to enable App permissions under settings (Settings ➝ Apps ➝ EgiGeoZone ➝ Permissions). After that start again. 

 The following permissions are needed:

 Write permission (Storage): This app writes a log file.
